name: Mario’s Super Picross™
description: This is the Japanese version of the game. This Super NES™ version of the popular ‘picture crossword’ game was originally released only in Japan and features hundreds of relaxing yet challenging brainteasers. Each Picross puzzle consists of a numbered grid of tiles which reveal a picture when correctly chiselled away. In Mario’s main mode, a wrong move means losing time. However, in the more difficult Wario mode, mistakes are not shown; so be careful. Also, a friend can help by joining in with a second controller.
